name: Gerrymander Me, Baby!
description:
The great country of Pantsaloosia is in dire need of... what?

Well, opinions are divided.

Whatever it is, your own goal is clear: seduce each of the Electoral Districts with luscious promises, gerrymander them, win the general elections, and BECOME THE PRESIDENT.

***

If you enjoyed this prototype let me know on itch.io or on Twitter @marywillowson. This might give me motivation to actually finish the project. ʕ•ᴥ•ʔ

CREDITS

Tracks "3 am West End" by statusq, "Pulling The Plug On Kindness" and "Limit 70" by Kevin MacLeod, "Hopeful" by Rafael Krux (from FreePD.com)

Photos by Leonhard Lenz, Levi Clancy, and Judgefloro (from Wikimedia Commons)

Gerry font by Ben Doessel and James Lee

Dialogic add-on by Emilio Coppola et al.

Faces from looks.wtf
